title: Which is better, Miley Cyrus or Liam Helmsworth? - Quora

response.answer_text: It would be whom is better, not which. And better for what? Liam is a good actor, handsome, has a good body, likes to surf, has an Australian accent, has a loving family, and has a gorgeous brother. Miley is a very good singer, can act some, has a loving family, has a dad who can sing, loves animals, has a free spirit and has a hillbilly twang when she wants. They were together off and on for ten years, got married about 9 months ago and then decided it wasn't going to work out. They split up, Liam went to Australia and went surfing and Miley went to Italy, I think, with Kaitlynn Carter and hung out on the Beach and made out. You will have to pick which one is better for you.
I'll take Miley, the daughter of Billy Ray Cyrus.
